alert.note: Alert for Allegheny; Beaver; Butler; Clarion; Forest; Lawrence; Mercer; Venango; Washington (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 1:22PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT GUERNSEY...MONROE...EASTERN COSHOCTON... CARROLL...TUSCARAWAS...NOBLE...HARRISON...JEFFERSON...COLUMBIANA... MUSKINGUM...BELMONT...BEAVER...VENANGO...NORTHWESTERN BUTLER... NORTHWESTERN ALLEGHENY...WEST CENTRAL CLARION...NORTHWESTERN FOREST...MERCER...NORTHWESTERN WASHINGTON...LAWRENCE...OHIO... MARSHALL...BROOKE AND HANCOCK COUNTIES... At 122 PM EDT, snow showers were located along a line extending from near Ravenna to near Massillon to 6 miles north of Coshocton. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. Winds in excess of 40 mph are possible with these snow showers. Locations impacted include... Wheeling, Cranberry, Zanesville, Moon Township, New Castle, Weirton, Steubenville, New Philadelphia, Hermitage, Sharon, Franklin Park, and Dover. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Ohio between mile markers 143 and 225. Interstate 70 in West Virginia between mile markers 0 and 7. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 1 and 29. Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 16 and 93. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 79 and 138. Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 46. Interstate 376 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 54. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Allegheny; Beaver; Butler; Clarion; Forest; Lawrence; Mercer; Venango; Washington
